attributes.action: bring British Troops back from the Middle East and use them on the streets of the UK to remove gangs, guns and knives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Forget about resolving conflicts in the middle east.  There are thousands of conflicts on the streets of London and other cities in the UK with violent gangs, guns and knives.
Lets have British Troops on the streets of the UK to remove this element from British society
